about_the_game:
This OST contains 48 tracks of original music from "Wanna Run Again", make you feel the same intense and touching feeling from the story, come take a look!

Track List
1.Sea breeze over the bridge
2.Sea's title
3.Sleep quiet
4.Default
5.Daily Morning
6.Queerness Sunset
